casebody.data:
CAMERON
v.
MERISEL, INC. No. 227PA04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 26, 2004. Gloria Taft Becker, Raleigh, for Merisel, Inc. et al. John D. Burns, Steven B. Epstein, Christopher G. Browning, Jr., Raleigh, for Tommy Cameron and Lisa Cameron.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 26th day of August 2004 by Defendant for extension of time to file new brief:

"Motion Allowed. Defendant (Merisel Inc., et al.) shall have up to and including the 27th day of September 2004 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 26th day of August 2004."
